special_powers.name: CRIMINAL MASTERMIND
special_powers.description: Kingpin can use Super Senses and Mastermind. When he uses Mastermind, he can choose to deal damage to an adjacent friendly character with a point value up to 125 points. This damage cannot later be dealt to Kingpin.

special_powers.name: HELL'S KITCHEN IS MINE
special_powers.description: Kingpin can use Leadership and Outwit.

special_powers.name: FROM THE SHADOWS
special_powers.description: Once during your turn, if Hand Ninja occupies hindering terrain and has no action tokens, he can make a close combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: MINION: WE FOLLOW THE STRONGEST
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Ulik is within 8 squares, Rock Troll can use Charge and modifies its attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: SPACE GEM
special_powers.description: Pip the Troll can use Phasing/Teleport. He can use it normally, or if he is not using the Carry ability, you can instead move him to any square that he has a clear line of fire to that is adjacent to both a friendly character and an opposing character. If you do, he can make a close combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: TELEPATHIC PROJECTION
special_powers.description: Marvel Boy can use Mind Control. After a successful attack by Marvel Boy using Mind Control, he can use Incapacitate as a free action targeting the same character.

special_powers.name: HIVE MIND
special_powers.description: When Phalanx Soldier attacks, you can modify its attack value by +1 for each other friendly character named Phalanx Soldier adjacent to it.

special_powers.name: FRUIT OF THE FAERIE
special_powers.description: Malekith can use Mind Control. When he does, he ignores hindering and elevated terrain and other characters for line of fire purposes.

special_powers.name: LORD OF THE DARK ELVES
special_powers.description: Malekith can use Psychic Blast and Pulse Wave. When Malekith uses Pulse Wave, he can choose to use his unmodified damage value and be dealt one unavoidable damage after the action resolves.

special_powers.name: ENCHANTING
special_powers.description: Enchantress can use Mind Control. If she does, she takes 1 damage for each 200 points of the successfully hit targets' combined point value, instead of each 100 points.

special_powers.name: DEVOTION
special_powers.description: Enchantress can use Mastermind and Toughness.

special_powers.name: MINION: TODAY IS NOT THAT DAY
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with both the Asgardian and Deity keywords is within 8 squares, Valkyrie can use Support, and can use the Carry ability, but only to carry friendly characters that have the Asgardian keyword.

special_powers.name: MINION: FOR ASGARD!
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with both the Asgardian and Deity keywords is within 8 squares, Asgardian Warrior can use Charge and modifies his attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: MINION: MARCH TO RAGNAROK!
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Surtur or Ragnarok Surtur is within 8 squares, Fire Demon can use Charge and modifies its attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: TRAIT
special_powers.description: Thor can use Super Strength.

special_powers.name: WARRIOR OF LIGHT
special_powers.description: Balder can use Pulse Wave as if he had a range value of 6.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE
special_powers.description: Fandral modifies his attack value by +1 for each other friendly character on the map that has the Warriors Three keyword.

special_powers.name: FANDRAL THE DASHING
special_powers.description: Fandral can use Flurry and Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: LEAPFROG
special_powers.description: Chase Stein can use Leap/Climb. Chase Stein can use the Carry ability to carry up to eight friendly characters that must have the Kid, Runaways, or Teen keyword. Chase Stein can carry friendly characters with the Runaways keyword regardless of their attack and speed symbols. Chase Stein's speed value is not modified by the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: FLAME
special_powers.description: Chase Stein can use Energy Explosion as if he had a range of 4.

special_powers.name: URU KNUCKLES BANDS
special_powers.description: Ulik can use Quake and Super Strength.

special_powers.name: STRONGEST OF ALL ROCK TROLLS
special_powers.description: Damage dealt to Ulik is reduced to 1. This power cannot be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: TRAIT
special_powers.description: Namora also has the [dolphin] speed symbol.

special_powers.name: TEAM PLAYER
special_powers.description: When using the Carry ability, Namora can carry two friendly characters if they both share a keyword with her.

special_powers.name: ELECTROLYTES TO THE RESCUE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, if Namora occupies water terrain, roll a d6 as a free action. Heal her of damage equal to half the result.

special_powers.name: GALACTIC MARKSMAN
special_powers.description: Give Star-Lord a ranged combat action. If he targets a single opposing character, modify his attack value by +2. If he targets more than one opposing character, modify his damage value by +2.

special_powers.name: SOUL SYPHON
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with 30 or higher point value is KO'd, Pluto may be placed in the square they occupied after any current actions are resolved. If Pluto does, he can immediately use Regeneration as a free action.

special_powers.name: DRAGON OF THE MOON
special_powers.description: Moondragon has the [giant] damage symbol. Moondragon can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: 360 DEGREE VISION
special_powers.description: Owl can use Perplex, but can only modify defense values.

special_powers.name: RULER OF THE EMPIRE
special_powers.description: All adjacent friendly characters with the Kree keyword modify their attack values by +1.

special_powers.name: PROTECTOR OF HELL'S KITCHEN
special_powers.description: Daredevil can use Leap/Climb and Stealth. Daredevil ignores other characters' Stealth.

special_powers.name: ODIN'S ENCHANTMENT
special_powers.description: Sif can use Phasing/Teleport. If she does, she can use the Carry ability. Sif's speed value is not modified by the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE
special_powers.description: Hogun modifies his attack value by +1 for each other friendly character on the map that has the Warriors Three keyword.

special_powers.name: HOGUN THE GRIM
special_powers.description: Whenever Hogun is given an action, for that action modify his damage value by +1 for each action token on him at the beginning of that action.

special_powers.name: GJALLERHORN
special_powers.description: Give Heimdall a power action and choose a target friendly character that has the Asgardian keyword and to which Heimdall has a clear line of fire. Put the target in an unoccupied square adjacent to Heimdall. Any target so placed can't be given an action until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SIGHT TO THE NINE WORLDS
special_powers.description: Characters using Charge, Running Shot, or Hypersonic Speed deal no damage to Heimdall. Heimdall ignores other characters' Shape Change and Stealth.

special_powers.name: SCREAMING MIMI
special_powers.description: Songbird can use Running Shot and Force Blast.

special_powers.name: PUNCH THROUGH!
special_powers.description: Songbird can use Barrier. Each time Songbird places a blocking terrain marker and before she places her next, remove all blocking terrain markers placed by other characters adjacent to the marker she just placed.

special_powers.name: TRAIT
special_powers.description: Venom can use Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: LIFE-FORCE POSESSION
special_powers.description: Once during your turn, another friendly character adjacent to Destroyer can be given a power action. If you do, deal that character 1 unavoidable damage, and heal Destroyer of 1 damage and remove 1 action token from Destroyer.

special_powers.name: DEFLECTION TRAJECTORY
special_powers.description: Captain America's line of fire is blocked only by walls and indoor blocking terrain.

special_powers.name: 612 SOULS
special_powers.description: Penance can use Force Blast. If he does, he can target all adjacent opposing characters and make a separate roll for each or choose a single target character up to 6 squares away to which he can draw a clear line of fire.

special_powers.name: PAIN IS MY POWER
special_powers.description: When Penance takes damage from an attack made by an adjacent opposing character, the attacker takes 2 damage. This is not an attack.

special_powers.name: GET BEHIND ME!
special_powers.description: Karolina Dean and friendly characters adjacent to her can use Energy Shield/Deflection if they can't already.

special_powers.name: DEVOURER OF ALL THAT REMAINS
special_powers.description: Fenris Wolf deals penetrating damage to characters with the Asgardian keyword.

special_powers.name: STAFF OF ONE
special_powers.description: Once during each of your turns, you may give Nico Minoru a free action and choose a standard power you didn't choose during your last turn. Nico can use that power until the beginning of you next turn.

special_powers.name: TRANSFER ESSENCE
special_powers.description: Ultron can use Mind Control. Ultron takes no damage from Mind Control if his target has the Armor or Robot keyword.

special_powers.name: HAND OF GLORY
special_powers.description: Any doubles rolled for any attack roll made by Hela are a critical hit, even double 1's, which are not a critical miss.

special_powers.name: FROM THE DEPTHS OF HEL
special_powers.description: Hela can use Psychic Blast and Energy Explosion.

special_powers.name: TOUCH OF LIFE
special_powers.description: Whenever another friendly character is KO'd, you may roll 2d6. This roll can't be rerolled or modified. On a result of 11 or 12, the character is not defeated; instead roll a d6 and heal the character of damage equal to the result.

special_powers.name: TRAIT
special_powers.description: Odin can use Super Strength.

special_powers.name: ALL YOU NEED IS LOVE
special_powers.description: Venus can use Incapacitate. She can use it normally, or instead be given a close combat action to use Incapacitate against all adjacent opposing characters.

special_powers.name: SNAKEFORM
special_powers.description: (non-optional) Seth has the [Giant]  damage symbol. Seth uses Battle Fury and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: PRINCE OF LIES
special_powers.description: Loki can use Mastermind. When he does, he can treat any friendly character 4 or fewer squares away to which he has a clear line of fire as if it were adjacent.

special_powers.name: GOD OF MISCHIEF
special_powers.description: Loki can use Outwit and Perplex.

special_powers.name: EXPENDABLE RESOURCES
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may KO any number of friendly characters that have both the Asgardian and Monster keywords. For each character KO'd this way, Surtur can use Exploit Weakness and modifies his damage value by +1 until end of turn.

special_powers.name: TRAIT
special_powers.description: Thor and Loki can use Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: HAMMER AND GLAMER
special_powers.description: Thor and Loki can use Running Shot and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: BRAWN AND BRAINS
special_powers.description: Thor and Loki can use Super Strength and Perplex.

special_powers.name: MIGHT AND MISCHIEF
special_powers.description: (non-optional) Thor and Loki uses Battle Fury and can use Exploit Weakness.

special_powers.name: DESTRUCTION AND DECEIT
special_powers.description: Thor and Loki can use Quake and Outwit.

special_powers.name: ARSENIC
special_powers.description: Once per action when an opposing character moves into a square adjacent to Gertrude Yorkes and Old Lace, that character is immediately dealt 1 damage before it can make any attack.

special_powers.name: LEND A DINO
special_powers.description: When an adjacent friendly character makes a close combat attack against a single opposing target, if Gertrude Yorkes and Old Lace are also adjacent to that target they can make a close combat attack against that target as a free action.

special_powers.name: WARRIORS THREE
special_powers.description: Volstagg gets +1 to his attack value for each other friendly character on the map that has the Warriors Three keyword.

special_powers.name: VOLSTAGG THE ENORMOUS
special_powers.description: Volstagg can't be knocked back. Opposing characters adjacent to Volstagg get -1 to their break away roll results.

special_powers.name: RELENTLESS
special_powers.description: Kurse can use Leap/Climb. After he resolves a move action, if Kurse is within 2 squares of an opposing character to which he has a clear line of fire, you can move him adjacent to that character.

Thor's Mighty Chariot must begin with its base completely in its player's starting area. Its base occupies 4 squares on the map. It can be adjacent to a maximum of 12 squares and can attack and be attacked through any of them. Thor's Mighty Chariot may make ranged combat attacks against any opposing characters that it has a clear line of fire to. Thor's Mighty Chariot can carry up to two friendly characters when using the Carry ability.
At the beginning of your turn, as a free action Thor's Mighty Chariot may destroy any walls or blocking terrain adjacent to it.

special_powers.name: BUTTING HEADS
special_powers.description: Thor's Mighty Chariot can use Force Blast. When it does, the target is dealt knockback damage equal to the number of squares it is knocked back in addition to any other knockback damage.

special_powers.name: HOOVES AND HORNS
special_powers.description: Thor's Mighty Chariot can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When it does, it can choose whether to replace its damage value with the result of that roll.

special_powers.name: BATTLE-FORGED
special_powers.description: Thor's Mighty Chariot can use Defend and Impervious.

special_powers.name: DRAG
special_powers.description: Thor's Mighty Chariot automatically breaks away. When it is given a move action, you may choose an adjacent opposing character and roll a d6. On a result of 5 or 6, after moving Thor's Mighty Chariot place the chosen character adjacent to it and deal that character 2 damage.

special_powers.name: ASGARDIAN CRYSTAL
special_powers.description: Thorbuster can use Toughness. Other characters using Quake, Energy Explosion, or Running Shot deal no damage to Thorbuster.

special_powers.name: TO FIGHT A GOD
special_powers.description: Thorbuster can use Exploit Weakness. When Thobuster attacks a character that has the Asgardian and/or Deity keywords, modify his damage value by +2.

special_powers.name: AMONG THE WEEDS
special_powers.description: Thor, Frog of Thunder can use Stealth. Lines of fire drawn to Thor, Frog of Thunder are blocked if he occupies water terrain.

special_powers.name: LEADER OF THE FROG AND ALLIGATOR ARMY
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, each opposing character within 6 squares of Thor, Frog of Thunder that is also adjacent to or occupying water terrain is dealt 1 damage.

special_powers.name: BODY OF A FROG
special_powers.description: Thor, Frog of Thunder can use Shape Change and Exploit Weakness.

special_powers.name: MINION: MANIPULATED BY THE GODS
special_powers.description: When a friendly character that has the Deity keyword is within 8 squares of Samantha Parrington, actions given to Samantha Parrington do not count toward your available actions for the turn.

special_powers.name: TURN ON YOUR ALLIES
special_powers.description: Friendly characters modify their damage by +1 when they attack opposing characters that possess the same team ability they do.

special_powers.name: THE ETERNAL GLORY OF ASGARD!
special_powers.description: Gharskygt can use Perplex twice on your turn, but can target only other friendly characters that have the Asgardian keyword, and modify only attack values.

special_powers.name: FAN THE FLAMES
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 for each opposing character adjacent to one or more friendly characters named Fire Demon. On a result of 5 or 6, deal 1 damage to that opposing character.

special_powers.name: ODINSLEEP
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, put a Sleep token on this card. When there are three Sleep tokens on this card, as a free action you must remove all of them and heal Thor, The Reigning of 5 damage. No action or game effect can cause Thor, The Reigning to move from the square he currently occupies. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: MJOLNIR RETURNED
special_powers.description: Thor, The Reigning can use the Flight ability and Ranged Combat Expert.

special_powers.name: INFERNO
special_powers.description: Ragnarok Surtur can use Poison. Damage dealt this way is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: ETERNAL FLAME
special_powers.description: Give Ragnarok Surtur a power action when he occupies an opponent's starting area. Any other character Ragnarok Surtur can draw a line of fire to is dealt 1 unavoidable damage. If this places a second action token on Ragnarok Surtur, deal him 1 unavoidable damage.
Characters with two action tokens modify their defense value by -1.
Hindering terrain markers and blocking terrain markers can't be placed. (Debris terrain markers and special markers are unaffected.)
Before the beginning of the first turn, starting with the player who played this battlefield condition, each player can remove one object from the game.
Characters occupying indoor terrain modify their speed values by -2. Characters using Smoke Cloud can place up to eight hindering terrain markers.
Abilities can't be countered. All characters can use Willpower if they can't already.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Range value of 6 or more and one {bolt}.

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: Choose a character. The character now has {bolt} {bolt}.

special_powers.name: Cost
special_powers.description: Twice the assigned character's unmodified range value.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Celebrity keyword.

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: Choose a character. The character can use Incapacitate with a range of 8, if it can't already. After the feat is used, remove it from the game.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: Choose a character. The character can use Steal Energy if it can't already.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Ranged Combat Expert or Super Senses

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: Choose a character. Ranged combat attacks made by the character ignore other character's Stealth. The character can use the Sharpshooter ability.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: {starburst}, Avengers TA

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: Choose a character. Once per game, choose one - the character has the {giant} damage symbol; or the character modifies its defense value by +1 against ranged combat attacks. The chosen effects last until the end of the game.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Battle Fury or Blades/Claws/Fangs or Willpower

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: Choose a character. Before the beginning of the first turn, choose an opposing character. The character modifies its attack value by +1 when attacking the chosen opposing character.

When the character makes a successful close combat attack against the chosen opposing character and the attack roll is doubles, you can choose to treat the damage from the attack as penetrating damage. If you do, remove this feat from the game after the attack resolves.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Deity keyword.

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: Choose a character. The character modifies its attack value by +1 when attacking a character without the Deity or Cosmic keyword that has a point value less than its own.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Runaways keyword

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: All characters on your force with the Runaways keyword are assigned this feat and have the following team ability instead of any other team ability:

Whenever a character with this team ability makes an attack, modify their attack value by +1 for each other friendly character with this team ability that dealt damage to an opposing character this turn.

special_powers.name: Cost
special_powers.description: 3 Points per character on your force with the Runaways keyword.

special_powers.name: Prerequisites
special_powers.description: Guardians of the Galaxy keyword

special_powers.name: Feat
special_powers.description: All characters on your force with the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword are assigned this feat and have the following team ability instead of any other team ability:
Powers possessed by character with this team ability can't be countered. This team ability can't be countered.

special_powers.name: Cost
special_powers.description: 4 points per character on your force with the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword.

This object can't be destroyed. Once per game per character, give a character occupying the same square as this object a power action and roll a d6. This roll can't be rerolled or modified. On a result of 6, remove this object from the game and place it on that character's card. Modify that character's attack and damage values by +2, and that character can use Quake, Energy Explosion, and the Flight ability. If that character is KO'd, place this object in the square that character last occupied.

special_powers.name: Lo, the rainbow bridge Bifrost will transport us instantaneously from the mortal realm to Asgard!
special_powers.description: Squares inside the border of an orange line are bridge terrain. Bridge terrain is clear terrain, but when a character is moving as a result of an action assigned to that character, they can treat squares of bridge terrain in the same numbered row as adjacent for movement purposes only. (Not for tournament play)
